question: Which of the following dam is officially known as the Afghan-India Friendship Dam?
explanation: Salma Dam is officially known as the Afghan-India Friendship Dam. It is a hydroelectric and irrigation dam project located on the Hari River in Chishti Sharif District of Herat Province in western Afghanistan. It has been completed within 10 years with the help of Indian Engineers. The Dam was inaugurated in June 2016 by the Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Afghanistan's President Ashraf Ghani.
